Data Analyst/Scientist.title: Data Analyst
Data Analyst/Scientist.responsibilities: Analyzing data, generating reports, identifying trends and patterns, providing insights to support decision-making.
Data Analyst/Scientist.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in mathematics, statistics, computer science, or related field, experience in data analysis, proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL).

Data Analyst/Scientist.title: Data Scientist
Data Analyst/Scientist.responsibilities: Building predictive models, analyzing large datasets, and developing machine learning algorithms to solve business problems.
Data Analyst/Scientist.qualifications: Master's degree in data science, computer science, or related field, experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).

Data Analyst/Scientist.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
Data Analyst/Scientist.responsibilities: Creating and maintaining dashboards, generating business insights, and supporting data-driven decision-making.
Data Analyst/Scientist.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, data analytics, or related field, experience with BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).

Marketing.title: Marketing Coordinator
Marketing.responsibilities: Supporting marketing campaigns, coordinating events, and assisting with social media management.
Marketing.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or related field, strong organizational and communication skills.

Marketing.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
Marketing.responsibilities: Developing and executing digital marketing strategies, managing online advertising campaigns, and analyzing web traffic.
Marketing.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in marketing, digital media, or related field, experience with digital marketing tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEO).

Marketing.title: Content Marketing Manager
Marketing.responsibilities: Creating and managing content strategies, overseeing content production, and optimizing content for SEO.
Marketing.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or related field, experience in content creation and management.

Software Developer.title: Front-End Developer
Software Developer.responsibilities: Developing and maintaining user-facing features, ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Software Developer.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field, experience with front-end technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript).

Software Developer.title: Back-End Developer
Software Developer.responsibilities: Developing server-side logic, integrating databases, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
Software Developer.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field, experience with back-end technologies (e.g., Node.js, Python, Java).

Software Developer.title: Full Stack Developer
Software Developer.responsibilities: Developing both client and server software, designing overall architecture, and ensuring application performance.
Software Developer.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field, experience with both front-end and back-end technologies.

Architect.title: Design Architect
Architect.responsibilities: Creating building designs, preparing detailed drawings, and ensuring designs comply with regulatory standards.
Architect.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in architecture, proficiency in design software (e.g., AutoCAD, Revit).

Architect.title: Project Architect
Architect.responsibilities: Managing architectural projects, coordinating with stakeholders, and overseeing construction phases.
Architect.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in architecture, experience in project management and construction.

Architect.title: Landscape Architect
Architect.responsibilities: Designing outdoor spaces, planning landscape projects, and ensuring environmental sustainability.
Architect.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in landscape architecture, experience in landscape design and environmental planning.

Management.title: Project Manager
Management.responsibilities: Planning and overseeing projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget, and coordinating team efforts.
Management.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business management or related field, experience in project management.

Management.title: Operations Manager
Management.responsibilities: Managing day-to-day operations, improving operational systems, and ensuring efficiency and productivity.
Management.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, experience in operations management.

Management.title: HR Manager
Management.responsibilities: Overseeing recruitment, managing employee relations, and developing HR policies.
Management.qualifications: Bachelor's degree in human resources or related field, experience in HR management.
